top_categories.workout_context: Flanders Legacy Gravel rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Flanders Legacy Gravel’s flanders rolling gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Flanders Legacy Gravel’s flanders rolling, belgian gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Flanders Legacy Gravel isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Flanders Legacy Gravel. Make this intensity feel like home.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Flanders Legacy Gravel when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Flanders Legacy Gravel’s flanders rolling gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Every session at Flanders Legacy Gravel intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Flanders Legacy Gravel — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Flanders Legacy Gravel — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
High-volume endurance builds the aerobic base that makes Flanders Legacy Gravel’s race-day efforts sustainable rather than destructive.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what Flanders Legacy Gravel’s flanders rolling gravel delivers on race day.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Flanders Legacy Gravel’s 75 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Flanders Legacy Gravel requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on flanders rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: flanders rolling, belgian gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Durability, and Gravel Specific to prepare you for 75 miles of flanders rolling gravel in Flanders, Belgium.
